column2: The Northeast has long been divided among feuding realms, only having worked together once to repel Leonidas at the Battle of Washington. A powerful ruler has united Hudsonia and Gotham to consolidate the pre-Event lands of New York, taking on its old name of The Empire State. This new realm is being recognized as a Northern rival to the Holy Columbian Confederacy, able to act as the Northeast's bulwark against all who may threaten it.
Never again will New York be threatened.
These Northerners cannot be allowed to challenge us.
Metropolitan Blood of the New Yorker
Metropolitan Blood of the New Yorker
This ruler founded the Empire State as a Northeast bulwark to rival the Holy Columbian Confederacy.
